summary: This is an email from an individual to a hospital's subject access team, urgently requesting their medical records from an admission on August 16, 2008, at St Thomas' Hospital. The requester states the records are needed for ongoing sex trafficking litigation.

persons.name: SubjectAccess
persons.context: The recipient of the email, part of the hospital's team handling record requests.

events.title: Hospital Admission at St Thomas'
events.description: The email author was admitted to St Thomas' Hospital.

events.title: Initial Records Request
events.description: The email author initially requested their hospital records under reference 121083.

events.title: Urgent Follow-up for Records
events.description: The email author sends a follow-up request, stating the need for the 2008 medical records is urgent for sex trafficking litigation.

keyFacts: An individual is seeking medical records from a hospital admission on August 16, 2008, at St Thomas' Hospital.
The requester states the records are urgently needed for ongoing 'sex trafficking litigation'.
The initial request for records (ref 121083) was made on August 23, 2023, and a follow-up was sent on October 3, 2023.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting a potential link between the requester's 2008 hospitalization and the broader Epstein sex trafficking case.
